title: Cozy Studio at The Summit!
posting_body: Invite your friends over to our pet friendly community for a barbeque on our rooftop deck and enjoy the picturesque view of Lake Union, the Cascade Mountains, and Downtown Seattle.
Community Amenities
Fitness Center • Rooftop BBQ/Picnic Area • Available 24/7 to Assist You • On-Site Maintenance •
On-Site Management • Online Resident Portal •
Courtesy Patrol •
Assigned Garage Parking Available • Recreation Room • Near Public Transportation • Sundeck • Sauna
Apartment Amenities
Quartz Counter-tops with Glass Tile Back-splash • Dishwasher •
Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances • Hardwood Inspired Floors • Microwave • Refrigerator • Additional Storage Available • Private Balcony/Patio • Washer/Dryer • Disposal
Here at The Summit at Lake Union, we offer renovated apartments complete with modern kitchens and baths.
Make yourself at home in our community by inviting your friends over for a barbeque on our rooftop deck and enjoying the picturesque view of Lake Union, the Cascade Mountains, and Downtown Seattle.
The convenience of our close proximity to Downtown Seattle, I-5, Hwy 99, and public transportation means that you'll have more time to relax, put your feet up, and enjoy all the comforts of home.
Have any questions?
Give us a call and we'll be happy to help you find your new home!

Here at The Summit we love pets!
Pets - Max 2 allowed, Rent $25.00, Deposit $400.00
